channel.title: [pi] ::Afk and logout help
channel.description: ive searched but i dint get any results on the ::afk. but can anybody help me with a ::afk command that says "im afk" and he sits in the chair. i also need help with the logout. i want it to when you logout it restores your hp so when you login you have full hp. i know this isn't a spoon feeding community, and i will keep searching but if you could help it would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: [pi] ::Afk and logout help
item.dc:creator: @tha_nickscape_guy tha nickscape guy
item.description:
@tha_nickscape_guy wrote:

It could work on your client, and i don’t know the animation sorry

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] ::Afk and logout help
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

hmm i think it might go like this im really not sure tho

if (command.startsWith("afk")) { forcedChat("IM AFK!!"); startAnimation(??????); string4UpdateRequired = true; }
you guys think that would work??? and what might the sitting on a stool animation id be?

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] ::Afk and logout help
item.dc:creator: @tha_nickscape_guy tha nickscape guy
item.description:
@tha_nickscape_guy wrote:

I’m not sure… but I think this would work on my server…

if (command.startsWith("afk")) { txt4 = "I'm AFK!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; }
Just PLEASE note that i’m not sure if this works on your client, so you have to make a backup ;)! Oh and i don’t really know how to add the animation, sorry you have to find that somewhere else ;).

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] ::Afk and logout help
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

When a person does the command “afk” send force chat “I’m AFK!” and set the sitting in chair anim as their stand anim.

Read full topic
